name: Defensive Fire & Hutt Smooch
Text: 'USED: Randomly select one card from opponent''s hand and place it, unseen, in Used Pile.LOST: Capture one opponent''s undercover spy (''cover is broken''). OR If opponent just deployed a spy to a site where opponent has no presence or Force icons, return spy to hand. Any Force used to deploy spy remains used and that card may not deploy this turn.',
